short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Intercept API calls and return mock responses for development purposes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RequestMocker is a powerful Chrome extension designed to streamline development and testing by intercepting API calls and providing mock responses. With RequestMocker, developers can:
•Simulate various API scenarios without depending on backend availability.
•Test and debug frontend applications efficiently by creating custom mock responses for specific requests.
•Gain full control over API behavior during the development process.

Its intuitive interface and robust features make it an essential tool for developers looking to improve productivity and maintain seamless workflows.
